options.text: If your organisation has 9 day fortnights you can add a `nineDayFortnightStart` field to the user collection. This should then store a Monday representing the start of the users full fortnight and will be used to calculate 9DF totals in the timesheet.

meta.note: This should store the LAST start (Monday) of the 9DF for the staff member.
